fields.name: a
javadoc: Contains a Map of the AttributeModifiers registered by potions

methods.name: a
javadoc: Returns true if the potion has an instant effect instead of a continuous one (eg Harming)

methods.name: a
javadoc: Gets a Potion from the potion registry using a numeric Id.

methods.name: a
javadoc: checks if Potion effect is ready to be applied this tick.

methods.name: a
javadoc: Gets the numeric Id associated with a potion.

methods.name: a
javadoc: Adds an attribute modifier to this effect. This method can be called for more than one attribute. The attributes are applied to an entity when the potion effect is active and removed when it stops.

methods.name: c
javadoc: returns the name of the potion

methods.name: f
javadoc: Returns the color of the potion liquid.

methods.name: h
javadoc: Get if the potion is beneficial to the player. Beneficial potions are shown on the first row of the HUD
